Texts.Eng:
Undead Humans brought back through vile energies or radiation. Stiff, slow, and tough to kill.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Carnivore

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  Health: x^green;1.1^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;30^reset;% Poison, Radiation. +^green;20^reset;% Ice, Shadow. +^green;10^reset;% Physical.
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Poison, Breathing. (Race Mod)
  ^green;Darkness/Night^reset;: Draining strikes.

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Atropus/Dark/Poison/Radioactive Biomes: Energy x^green;1.05^reset;, Health x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;5^reset;% Speed.
  Chromatic/Hot/Sulphuric: Energy x^red;0.75^reset;, Health x^red;0.9^reset;.

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Fists: Damage x^green;1.15^reset;.
  Scythe: Damage x^green;1.1^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance, ^green;1^reset;% Crit Damage.
  Dual Fists: Damage x^green;1.05^reset;, +^green;1^reset;% Crit Chance.

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  Energy x^red;0.8^reset;.
  Resist: -^red;40^reset;% Fire, Cosmic.
  Charisma: -^red;35^reset;%.
  Hunger: +^red;25^reset;% Hunger Rate.
